name: potency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
strength, influence, or effectiveness: This new drug's potency is not yet known. He owed his popular support to the potency of his propaganda machine.
a man's ability to have sex: Consuming large amounts of alcohol can significantly reduce a man's potency. Compare
impotence (SEXUAL PROBLEM)
